content: flying geese hat streelymade designs size adult s/m approx 21 inch circumference yarn briggs and little heritage in khaki mc - approx 160 yards* briggs and little heritage in hunter orange cc - approx 40 yards or aran weight yarn to get gauge *yardage includes pom-pom gauge 20 sts x 22 row = 4 in charted pattern with larger needles recommended needle size 4 5mm 16in circular 5 5mm 16in circular 5 5mm dpns instructions with smaller needles and mc co 90 sts work in k1 p1 rib until piece measures 4 inches from cast-on edge change to 5 5mm needles the colourwork motif is a 10- stitch pattern repeat repeated 9x work rounds 1- 27 of the chart crown decreases change to dpns when necessary row1 k1 ssk k5 k2tog * around 72 sts remain row 2-4 k row 5 k1 ssk k3 k2tog * around 54 sts remain row 6-7 k row 8 k1 ssk k1 k2tog * around 36 sts remain row 9 k row 10 ssk k2tog *around 18 sts remain row 11 k row 12 k2tog * around 9 sts remain pull yarn through remaining stitches weave in ends block and make a pom-pom if desired i used a 3 and 3/4 pom- pom maker
